transcript:
Hello?
Hello
Executive: Hello. Haan ji, ma'am?
Customer: Ji sir, aapne hata li hai woh Tulsi wale product?
Customer: Sorry?
Executive: Haan, hata, haan, hata li ma'am.
Customer: Hata li hai na? Toh aap dekhiye abhi aapko dikh rahi hai ek catalog view aaya hua hai aapke paas. 9 ft white marble temple ka dekhiye.

Customer: Do minute.
Executive: Ji sir.

Customer: Haan, haan, yeh Delhi ka hai.
Executive: Haan, yeh catalog view hai. Inhone view kara hai aapka profile. Ab ho sakta hai inhe chahiye bhi, chahiye bhi ho ya na bhi ho, dono cheezein hain. Aap baat kar lijiyega. Theek hai, theek hai. Aur ab aapke paas jo hai yeh portal inquiry toh kam ho jayengi aani.
Customer: Okay, okay. Thank you.
Executive: Okay. Aur abhi sir main yeh dekh rahi thi aapki profile mein na kuch keywords hain jo aapne negative mark kare hue hain. Ek baar bata dijiye aap unmein deal karte hain ya nahi? Jaise ki hai aapka yeh yeh marble Ram statues us us yeh bhi aapne hataya hua hai. Matlab statue wale aapne.
Customer: Haan, haan, jo hataye hue hain unmein kisi mein deal nahi karta main yeh samajh lo.
Executive: Achcha. Ab aapke jo bache hain na, mehrab bacha hai, marble jaali, marble fountain, white marble tiles, temples, marble temples, stone garden fountain, marble wall fountain, marble bird bath, stone fountain, marble Khatu Shyam statue, stone wall fountain, mimbar. Haan ji. Aur stone carved temple, stone picture frame, Makrana Dungri temple, yeh bache hain ab bas.
Customer: Theek hai ma'am, theek hai.
Executive: Bilkul theek hai na? Aur aapne sir se shayad ek saal ki catalog ka payment try kara tha kya?
Customer: Nahi, nahi, woh toh aise hi dekh raha tha main toh.
Executive: Theek hai. Toh abhi aapka kuch plan hai renewal ka?
Customer: Nahi, nahi, abhi nahi kuch bhi ma'am.
Executive: Achcha, toh kab karaenge sir? Vahi February mein hi?
Customer: Haan, haan, February mein hi ma'am.
Executive: Aapke saath toh maximizer ka bhi discussion hua tha na sir?
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Maximizer ka bhi discussion hua tha na sir? Maximizer ke baare mein kya hai?
Customer: Hmm? Nahi, nahi, abhi koi plan nahi hai na isliye.
Executive: Abhi koi?
Customer: Abhi koi plan nahi hai aage ka recharge woh badhane ke liye kuch bhi nahi hai aage ka.
Executive: Okay, toh renewal toh sir at least kara hi lijiye iska.
Customer: Dekhenge ma'am woh abhi.
Executive: Kab tak kara denge sir renewal?
Customer: Kya karwana hai?
Executive: Renewal sir, renewal.
Customer: Nahi samjha nahi renewal.
Executive: Renewal sir aapki services ka jo tenure hai use extend karane ke liye.
Customer: Extend karane ke liye?
Executive: Haan, service bhi toh service ka ek saal pura ho jata hai toh sir service ka renewal bhi ho jata hai na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Usi ke regarding keh rahi hoon main.
Customer: Toh woh toh us time pe dekhenge na jab service khatam hoegi tab.
Executive: Sir service khatam hogi tab aapki price milegi aapko 32,000 plus GST. Advance mein aap karate hain toh aapko mil raha hai 28,000 plus GST.
Customer: Koi nahi, main dekh lunga ma'am woh toh.
Executive: Theek hai. Aur baki aapne abhi yeh jo not satisfied ka feedback diya tha na sir, usse aapki complaint raise hui thi. Woh complaint main close kar de rahi hoon ab. Aapke paas na feedback aayega.
Customer: Haan, haan, main satisfied hoon ma'am, koi baat nahi mera.
Executive: Theek hai. Aur sir aap jo leads purchase karte hain na, usmein please lead manager se reply bhi kariye sabko teen-teen. Especially marble ki jo jitni bhi inquiry aap marble ki le rahe hain, un sabhi marble ki inquiry pe reply zarur kariye.
Customer: Theek hai ma'am.
Executive: Theek hai. Baki aap mera number ab save kar lijiye aapko kuch bhi issue aata hai service mein. Toh aap mujhe connect kar lijiyega. Pratiksha.
Customer: Naam kya bataya?
Executive: Pratiksha.
Customer: Theek hai ma'am.
Executive: Aur abhi aapne yeh jo lead purchase kari thi marble pillar ki ya Makrana pink marble ka, C fit white marble fountain, yahan pe aapki baat hui sir kuch?
Customer: Haan, kuch bhi na ho kabhi bhi nahi, itne din ho gaye main toh pareshan hoon isse. Main karwa ke pachta raha hoon na.
Executive: Are sir aisa mat kahiye aapko milega. Lekin dekhiye aapne jaise yeh marble pillar ki jo lead purchase kari thi na. Woh ek madam hai woh phone hai woh khushi khushi phone hai aap khushi ho kaun ho?
Customer: Main khushi nahi hoon, main khushi ki manager hoon company ki.
Customer: Main toh woh kya bol rahi hai woh bol rahi hai aapko kuch profit toh hua. Are ma'am ismein koi profit nahi hota mujhe abhi tak. Profit hota toh main itna karta bhi nahi ma'am.
Executive: Achcha, abhi tak aapki ek bhi lead nahi convert hui hai?
Customer: Haan. Profit hota toh main itna karta bhi nahi ma'am. Mere paise bhi na nikalte isse.
Executive: Okay. Abhi sir aapne jo lead purchase kari thi na jaise marble pillar ki, yeh ek din pehle IndiaMART pe post hui thi. Toh aap jab bhi lead purchase karte hain na, is baat ka dhyan rakhe ki lead usi din post honi chahiye. Matlab purani na ho. Agar aap purani lead purchase karenge na toh us buyer se kya hai aur. Haan mujhe bataya tha purani chalaega.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Okay.
Customer: Theek hai ma'am.
Executive: Thank you sir.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting any profit from leads.

- Customer is regretting purchasing the leads.

- Wants to know who called from Khushi's phone.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed she is Khushi's manager.

- Executive advised to reply to lead manager.

- Executive advised to purchase leads posted same day.

- Executive closed the complaint raised due to feedback.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will see about renewal later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, renewal, marble, profit, complaint
